info.title: ApplicationInsightsManagementClient
info.description: Azure Application Insights client for ProactiveDetection configurations of a component.

get.description: Gets a list of ProactiveDetection configurations of an Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more ProactiveDetection configurations of an Application Insights component.

get.description: Get the ProactiveDetection configuration for this configuration id.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: ConfigurationId
parameters.description: The ProactiveDetection configuration ID. This is unique within a Application Insights component.

200.description: The ProactiveDetection configuration for this configuration id.

put.description: Update the ProactiveDetection configuration for this configuration id.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: ConfigurationId
parameters.description: The ProactiveDetection configuration ID. This is unique within a Application Insights component.

requestBody.description: Properties that need to be specified to update the ProactiveDetection configuration.

200.description: The ProactiveDetection configuration that was successfully updated.

CustomEmails.description: Custom email addresses for this rule notifications

Enabled.description: A flag that indicates whether this rule is enabled by the user

LastUpdatedTime.description: The last time this rule was updated

DisplayName.description: The rule name as it is displayed in UI

HelpUrl.description: URL which displays additional info about the proactive detection rule

IsEnabledByDefault.description: A flag indicating whether the rule is enabled by default

IsHidden.description: A flag indicating whether the rule is hidden (from the UI)

IsInPreview.description: A flag indicating whether the rule is in preview

SupportsEmailNotifications.description: A flag indicating whether email notifications are supported for detections for this rule

RuleDefinitions.description: Static definitions of the ProactiveDetection configuration rule (same values for all components).

SendEmailsToSubscriptionOwners.description: A flag that indicated whether notifications on this rule should be sent to subscription owners

ApplicationInsightsComponentProactiveDet.description: Properties that define a ProactiveDetection configuration.

ConfigurationId.name: ConfigurationId
ConfigurationId.description: The ProactiveDetection configuration ID. This is unique within a Application Insights component.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

ResourceNameParameter.name: resourceName
ResourceNameParameter.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.
